metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32275 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in faust through v2.30.5. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function CosPrim::computeSigOutput() located in cosprim.hh. It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: faust package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-10-18').
